AI Description: OpenSSL is a robust, commercial-grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose cryptography library.
Core Features: Implementation Of Ssl & Tls Protocols, Support For A Wide Range Of Cryptographic Algorithms, Secure Cryptographic Libraries, Large Variety Of Functions For Secure Communication
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
